title: [BUG][macOS] NSOpenGLContext flushbuffer causes SIGABRT - mono_jit_runtime_invoke
body:
**Description**

i'm using a SKGLView on Xamarin.Forms on macOS to render various shapes and images on a canvas. From time to time (haven't found a pattern so far) the application crashes with the following native error:

i'm currently using `SkiaSharp` version `2.80.2` but reports with this issue occured with previous versions as well - i have tested it with version `2.80.0` and above.

**Code**
```
Incident Identifier: 7275ecd2-0ca6-435c-bd56-f4dcfbfec243
CrashReporter Key:   F2B54549-12E7-4D0F-8BE2-17F0CD1076BF
Hardware Model:      MacBookPro16,2
Process:         MyApp [459]
Path:            /Users/USER/Downloads/MyApp.app/Contents/MacOS/MyApp
Identifier:      myapp.macos
Version:         0.3.114 (3872)
Code Type:       x86_64
Parent Process:  launchd [1]

Date/Time:       2021-03-18T10:04:01.999Z
Launch Time:     2021-03-18T09:57:45Z
OS Version:      Mac OS X 10.15.7 (19H2)
Report Version:  104

Exception Type:  SIGABRT
Exception Codes: #0 at 0x7fff682cb33a
```
